descriptionHtml:
--== Introduction ==--

\" ... take it, and you\'ll walk as a lion among sheep ...\" -Harkon

That\'s quite a lie don\'t you think? Most city guard could kill vanila Vampire Lord easily, a spit of dragon\'s fire breath could turn Vampire Lord to dust in almost instant, and so many other. With this mod there will be no more a weak big humanoid bat so called Vampire Lord, you\'ll become the strongest vampire, Vampire Overlord!

NOTE 1 :
I made this for playing with these conditions and mods:
- Master Level Difficulty
- Mighty Dragons, I use the Nightmare version : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13423
- Challenging Skyrim, I use the Super Hard version : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12077
- High Level Enemies, I use the Hardcore version : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27866

If you\'re playing without those conditions or equally challenging mods, yes this mod is OP. You\'ve been warned.

NOTE 2 :
I have problem for making screen shot while casting new Raise Dead and Corpse Curse effects, since tfc command seems to not working properly while in Vampire Lord form. So no pic for mod for now, sorry >_< . I\'ll be gratefull if anyone want to help make a screen shot for the new effect of Raise Dead and Corpse Curse.

--== Stats Boost ==--

Vampire Overlord will have much greater stats boost and will scaling with your level.

- Claw damage : will do 50 damage until level 10, and will increase by 50 points each 5 levels (until levels 50).

- Health : have additional 100 Health points and 10% increase in regen rate until level 10, and will increase 50 Health points and 10% regen rate each 5 levels (until levels 50).

- Magicka : have additional 100 Magicka points and 10% increase in regen rate until level 10, and will increase 50 Magicka points and 10% regen rate each 5 levels (until levels 50).

- Stamina : have additional 50 Stamina points and 10% increase in regen rate until level 10, and will increase 50 Stamina points and 10% regen rate each 5 levels (until levels 50).

- Damage Resist : will have 20% damage resist until level 10, and will increase 10% each 5 levels (until levels 50). With vanilla setting this will cap to 80%, and up to 90% if used with other mod that change the cap.

- Magic Resist : will have 10% Magic resist until level 10, and will increase 10% each 5 levels (until levels 50). With vanilla setting this will cap to 80%, and up to 90% if used with other mod that change the cap.

- Fire Resist : will have 3% Fire resist until level 10, and will increase 3% each 5 levels (until levels 50).

- Frost Resist : will have 100% Frost resist.

- Shock Resist : will have 10% Magic resist until level 10, and will increase 10% each 5 levels (until levels 50).

--== Ability Perks ==-

- Power of the Grave now give 100 points boost to Health, Magicka, and Stamina. Also 10% boost to regen rate.

- Night Cloak bats now will do 100 damage per sec. Let the bats kill the weaker enemies while you could focus on blasting stronger ones.

- Poison talos make claws do 100 poison damage for 4 sec.

--== Blood Magic Spells ==--

- Drain Life projectile speed now twice as fast! Now it\'s possible to shoot flying dragons with it.

- Also Drain Life will scaling more powerful and also cost twice as much magicka to make it balance with magicka bonus stats :
Level 1-10 : 100 physical damage plus 50 points absorb health
Level 11-20 : 200 physical damage plus 75 points absorb health
Level 21-30 : 300 physical damage plus 100 points absorb health
Level 31-40 : 400 physical damage plus 125 points absorb health
Level 41+ : 500 physical damage plus 150 points absorb health

- Corpse Curse now has the same blast effect like Mass Paralysis! No more the petty green bolt as normal Paralyze spell.

- Vampiric Grip will do 100 dmg per second. You could torture or choke someone to death.

- Raise an undead army with Raise Dead blood magic! Now it have area effect just like Ritual Stone power, with scaling:
Level 1-10 : Up to enemies level 20 for 60 sec
Level 11-20 : Up to enemies level 40 for 90 sec
Level 21-30 : Up to enemies level 60 for 120 sec
Level 31-40 : Up to enemies level 80 for 150 sec
Level 41+ : Up to enemies level 100 for 240 sec

--== Installation ==--

- Use NMM to install and uninstall

--== Requirements ==--

- Latest Skyrim update
- Dawnguard DLC

--== Compatibility ==--
Compatible with Better Vampire and Royal Bloodline with this load order:
- Better Vampires.esp
- Vampirelordroyal.esp
- Vampire OverLord.esp

--== Recomended Mods ==--
To make Vampire Lord looks more badass:
- Vampire Lord Retexture : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23775
- Grimoas Vampire Lord : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29085

--== Credits ==--
- Bethesda for making Skyrim and Dawnguard DLC.
- Senn for making True Vampire Lord mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21723) which inspire me to make this mod.
